-- Megatron --

Megatron's wings wrap around his front, absorbing some laserfire, and 
protecting him as he lands behind some rocky coverage similar to that 
which Wolfenstein and the other Predacons were behind.

"They cannot continue to allow their automated defenses to continue 
the battle much longer, their shields must fall! Predacons, 
concentrate your weapons on the shields, BRING THEM DOWN." Megatron 
orders the Predacons, as he raises his plasma cannon, and fires two 
blasts at the shields.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Inside the base, the floors shake as the many hits explode on the 
> shields.
> 
> Computer: Warning, shields dropping to 95%. Automatic defenses 
online 
> and firing.
> 
> The six massive double-barreled laser turrets start firing back on 
any 
> target they can pick up. In this case, any pred could be hit.
> 
> Tyrael: So soon? Damn you Megatron! You can't even realize when to 
> stop! So much the better, I will kill you here and now!
> 
> He walks to the exit, two light shards in each hand, his body 
emitting 
> a strong blue aura. He was going to fight and destroy the puny 
> renegades.
>
